metadata.title: CVE-2022-4283 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in X.Org. This security flaw occurs because theXkbCopyNames function left a dangling pointer to freed memory, resulting inout-of-bounds memory access on subsequent XkbGetKbdByName requests.. Thisissue can lead to local privileges elevation on systems where the X serveris running privileged and remote code execution for ssh X forwardingsessions.

criterions.comment: xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
